description_it: Classica insalata francese con lattuga, tonno, uova sode, olive nere, pomodorini, acciughe e cipollotto.
description_en: Classic French salad with lettuce, tuna, hard-boiled eggs, black olives, cherry tomatoes, anchovies and spring onion.

steps.instruction_it: Preparare le uova sode: metterle in un pentolino, coprire con acqua fredda e portare a bollore. Dopo 7 minuti dal bollore, scolare e raffreddare.
steps.instruction_en: Make hard-boiled eggs: place in a pot, cover with cold water and bring to boil. After 7 minutes from boiling, drain and cool.

steps.instruction_it: Eliminare la parte verde del cipollotto e tagliarlo a rondelle sottili. Lavare e tagliare i pomodorini in quarti.
steps.instruction_en: Remove green part of spring onion and slice thinly. Wash and quarter cherry tomatoes.

steps.instruction_it: Scolare i filetti di acciughe e tagliarli a pezzetti. Sgusciare le uova e dividerle in 4 parti.
steps.instruction_en: Drain anchovy fillets and chop. Peel eggs and cut into quarters.

steps.instruction_it: Lavare la lattuga e spezzettarla a mano in una ciotola capiente. Aggiungere olive e pomodorini.
steps.instruction_en: Wash lettuce and tear by hand into a large bowl. Add olives and tomatoes.

steps.instruction_it: Aggiungere cipollotto, tonno sgocciolato e acciughe. Condire con olio, sale e pepe.
steps.instruction_en: Add spring onion, drained tuna and anchovies. Dress with oil, salt and pepper.

steps.instruction_it: Mescolare bene, completare con gli spicchi di uovo sodo e servire.
steps.instruction_en: Toss well, top with egg quarters and serve.
